content: {A抛扳手}To fix this... I should use... Hmm? I was just thinking about how to fix the vehicle.

content: Not to brag, but I invented the ten-in-one super wrench I use for vehicle maintenance all by myself!<style=SizeSmall>Though I can't remember how I made it anymore.</style>
info: 找墨尔斯赶海-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A抛扳手}To fix this... I should use... Hmm? I was just thinking about how to fix the vehicle. Anyway, I mean, <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> is waiting for you.

content: But you'll need a pogo stick to get down to the beach. You can get one from <style=NpcName>Mobai</style>. He's waiting for you.

content: {A想到了}My daily routine? Three hundred laps along the coastline, under the blazing sun!
